parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The pageSize of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: (+|-)property,(+|-)property. Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported. Example: ?sort=+id,-date

post.description:
Get all Patients with paging by criteria.

Available attributes for criteria:
firstName; lastName; nationalId; gender.code (M/F); birthName; birthDate (yyyy-MM-dd); insuranceId; category; prefix; suffix; mpi

Available operators:
(=)equals, (!)not equals, (:)like, (>)after/greater than or equal to, (<)before/less than or equal to

post.description:
Get all Episodes by by criteria.

Available attributes for criteria:
id,patient.id,patient.firstName,patient.lastName,patient.nationalId,patient.gender.code,patient.birthDate,patient.birthName,patient.insurence.code,patient.category,patient.sufix,patient.preffix,patient.mpi

Available operators:
(=)equals, (!)not equals, (:)like, (>)after/greater than or equal to, (<)before/less than or equal to

post.description:
Get all Devices by by criteria.

Available attributes for criteria:
id, btsId, internalId, deviceGroup, comInterface, manufacturer, name, orgUnitId, qrCode, address, type, validObservations

Available operators:
(=)equals, (!)not equals, (:)like, (>)after/greater than or equal to, (<)before/less than or equal to
